name.en: Theoretical and Practical  Approaches to Future Learning

department.ch: 網路學習科技研究所碩士班
department.en: Graduate Institute of Network Learning Technology

goal.ch:
1.了解未來學習的核心理論：幫助學生掌握教育科技與學習理論的最新發展，例如自適應學習、沉浸式學習和混合學習。
2.應用於實際場景：指導學生設計或評估教育解決方案，以應對快速變化的教育需求。
3.發展批判性思考與創造力：透過小組合作和專題討論，幫助學生挑戰現有的教育假設並提出創新方案。
goal.en:
Understand Core Theories of Future Learning: Equip students with insights into the latest developments in educational technology and learning theories, such as adaptive learning, immersive learning, and blended learning.
Apply Concepts to Real-World Scenarios: Guide students in designing or evaluating educational solutions that address rapidly evolving learning needs.
Develop Critical Thinking and Creativity: Foster collaboration and innovative problem-solving through group projects and discussions.

outline.ch:
•  理論基礎 (第1–5週)：
•未來學習的定義與範疇。
•智慧學習環境的設計理論。
•基於數據的教育決策。
•學習者自主與個性化學習模式。
•  工具與技術 (第6–10週)：
•探索生成式AI、VR/AR、學習分析的應用。
•使用案例分析了解如何整合這些技術。
•訓練使用當前工具以設計模擬學習活動。
•  實踐應用 (第11–14週)：
•小組專題製作：學生根據理論設計一個未來學習的方案。
•提供真實案例，例如學校改進計劃或企業培訓項目。
•  評估與改進 (第15–16週)：
•學生展示其方案，並接受同儕和教師的回饋。
•討論如何改進課程設計與實踐。
outline.en:
1. Theoretical Foundations (Weeks 1–5)
Definition and scope of future learning.
Design theories for intelligent learning environments.
Data-driven decision-making in education.
Learner autonomy and personalized learning models.
2. Tools and Technologies (Weeks 6–10)
Applications of Generative AI, VR/AR, and learning analytics.
Case studies on integrating these technologies into learning.
Hands-on training with current tools to design simulated learning activities.
3. Practical Applications (Weeks 11–14)
Group projects: Students design a future-learning solution based on theoretical frameworks.
Real-world case studies, such as school improvement programs or corporate training projects.
4. Evaluation and Refinement (Weeks 15–16)
Project presentations with peer and instructor feedback.
Discussion on improving course designs and implementations.

gradMethod.ch:
1.參與與討論 (20％)：透過線上與實體參與討論評估學生理解。
2.作業 (30％)：每個模組後繳交反思或分析報告。
3.專題計畫 (50％)：以展示、報告與書面計畫形式呈現。
gradMethod.en:
Participation and Discussion (20％): Evaluate student engagement through online and in-person discussions.
Assignments (30％): Submit reflective essays or analytical reports after each module.
Group Project (50％): Present a comprehensive project plan through presentations, reports, and demonstrations.
